tool_description: Stock 365 day price history for all stocks within the S&P 500.
name: Index Stock Data
title: Index Stock Data

api_list.name: S&P 500
api_list.description: Returns the latest 365 day Adjusted Close price history for every stock within the S&P 500.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://index-stock-data.p.rapidapi.com/sp500"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "index-stock-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://index-stock-data.p.rapidapi.com/sp500"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "index-stock-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
